method.text: Heat the oil and saute the onion and garlic for 1-2 min until softened. Add the peppers, courgettes and aubergine. Cook, covered, for 4-5 min, tossing the pan occasionally.
Add the tomatoes and cook gently for 15-20 min. Mix in the parsley, adjust the seasoning. Leave to cool then chill.
Brush the filo pastry sheets on one side with butter and cut into 16 x 13 cm squares. Group the squares into fours, placing one on top the other, buttered side up, to form a star shape.
Spoon a little of the cooled ratatouille mixture in the centre of each pastry star. Brush the edges with butter. Pull up the corners and pinch together to enclose the filling, making a purse.
Place on greased baking trays. Brush with the remaining butter. Cook in the oven for about 5-10 min, or until crisp and golden.
